author: mdunser
body:
#### PR description:

backport to 10_6_X branch of muon pT > 15 GeV passthrough, regardless of ID

this is the backport of PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32103
additional backports of #33208 and #33212
title: NanoAOD: backport to 10_6_X branch of muon pT > 15 GeV passthrough, addition of isotrack charge and muon isStandalone flag.
